subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Giants will probably feel like they are playing on the road. Thousands of New England fans, who want to watch Tom and Randy and Bill make history, have gobbled up tickets. But that is a good thing. The Giants are 7-1 on the road.
snippet: The Giants will probably feel like they are playing on the road. Thousands of New England fans, who want to watch Tom and Randy and Bill make history, have gobbled up tickets. But that is a good thing. The Giants are 7-1 on the road.
